snippet.title: Back Then - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
‘Back Then’ is a short atmospheric first-person adventure game, with elements of detective exploration, mystery, and themes of self-discovery.

It takes place in a retirement home, where the players control Thomas, an aged man in his 80’s suffering from Alzheimer’s. He moves around in his wheelchair, and rarely receives visits from his family. 

Seeing himself alone and with no one to talk to, he starts to try remembering his past through the various important objects in his life - such as a wedding photo, his guitar, his wedding ring, among various others. Each object represents an important piece of Thomas’s history, also making him remember things in the present day, such as his wife and three children.

Thomas, who is simultaneously fighting Alzheimer’s, will try to uncover what happened in his life, and whether or not someone will come to visit him soon…
